alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 02 at 7:23PM EDT until May 05 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. For the Suncook River...including North Chichester...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flooding occurs at several camp sites at the Lazy River Campground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 PM EDT Tuesday was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday evening and continue falling to 5.8 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
